Package gw.cc.claim.entity

Interface Evaluation

All Superinterfaces:
com.guidewire.cc.domain.claim.ClaimContactRoleOwner, ClaimContactRoleOwner, com.guidewire.cc.domain.contact.EntityContactRoleOwner
public interface Evaluation extends com.guidewire.cc.domain.claim.ClaimContactRoleOwner
Evaluation Links a claim to evaluations.
